pageProduct.name: Swisse Kids Immune 60 Gummies
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Kids Immune Gummies are a premium quality formula to support immune system health and wellbeing. Made with natural colours and flavours and no artificial sweeteners, these great-tasting gummies are 99.9% sugar free and are ideal for fussy eaters and growing children on the go.

Swisse Kids Immune Gummies are a premium quality formula to support Kids immune system health and wellbeing:
- Vitamin C and Zinc support immune system function and help stimulate a healthy immune system response
- Vitamin C supports dietary iron absorption when dietary intake is inadequate

Benefits:
- Great tasting for fussy eaters
- Natural Orange Flavour
- 99.9% Sugar Free
- No artificial sweeteners
- Naturally sweetened with Stevia
- No added dairy or lactose

Size: 60 Gummies

Warnings

Vitamin & mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. This medicine contains maltitol & mannitol (Total 2.7g per maximum daily dose) and may have a laxative effect or cause diarrheoa. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional

Ingredients

VITAMIN C (ascrobic Acid) 80mg
ZINC (from zinc sulfate monohydrate) 3mg
CITRUS BIOFLAVANOIDS EXTRACT 5mg
Contains Sulfites.

No added lactose, yeast, egg, soy, artificial colours or flavours

Directions

2-8 years: Chew 1 gummy daily, during or immediately after a meal.
9-12 years: Chew 2 gummies daily, during or immediately after a meal.
Or as directed by a healthcare professional. Do not swallow whole.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
